Text:
Awesome upload!  However a word of caution:

WARNING!!!  Under the path "Milton Bradley/Space Crusade" each file contains ""js:redirector-fp" Trojan"...  Beware.
Has anyone gone on to actually print or pirate a game? I've thought of using the scanned copies of the Munchkin game and having it printed through a business card company and making a mini munchkin.
